taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ whaten _ lata u amsi _ seghleghqe fqaafsi _ pi s qell usi _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe gkan _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ manigugh utu te aqe ainkut _ ata mun _ .
ellnga u uq _ iqite sigh _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ , _ whang ku ng in aam ta _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tam agh agh llag an _ yug m _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ ayuqe uq _ .
esgha _ whaten _ ip a pi gh q utk es aghq agh put _ liisimake i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ qaatke lleg mteggun _ qelegh sagh i _ .
kina _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ liisimake aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ naqam _ qaatke gpenaki _ qelegh sagh i _ , _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ , _ nalluke a llu _ ip a pi gh qell eq _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ piniqe i llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ipapestaaq _ iighwigh kau uq _ , _ tawaten _ ip a pi gh q utk es aghq aq agh put _ ellng an itu l v ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ pi lghii _ kiyagh teng ngun il uni _ ellnga ni _ , _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ pi llgh a tun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ una _ qelegh sagh _ lata tke kegka _ elpesi nun _ nutaghagh u nghite uq _ . _ T aan ang u uq _ neghightagh _ qelegh sagh _ nagate kayug i _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ , _ taana _ ungipagh u uq _ nagate kayug i _ .
iwernga _ una _ qelegh sagh _ lata tke kegka _ elpesi nun _ nutaghagh u uq _ . _ Taa m _ ip a pi gh qell gha _ esghagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ Christ- aku n llu _ elpesigun llu _ qayughllak _ mamleg _ aga _ nagh ugh teng ngu uq _ , _ nighug pig _ kuukgute u uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ pi lghii _ nighug mete ni luni _ naqam _ ugumi ke luku _ ugpeq aal g ut ni _ , _ paninang _ m am leg m el ngu ug uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ugpeq aal g ut ni _ nighug mi _ kiyagh teng ngu uq _ , _ n igh ug m e tu t min eng _ naagte sighqagh ite uq _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke gkunigu _ ugpeq aal g ut ni _ , _ mamleg mete uq _ . _ I g legh teng ngu uq _ mamleg mi _ , _ talwa _ nalluke uq _ navek _ pi u te ni _ qayughllak _ mamleg m _ ayaa stekaqe a _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ seghleghqe lleg si _ seghevute lleg nge kau ut _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ- a _ .
ata ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ ellnga _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ nukalpigagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ kayaalqe kaqe kesi _ tughneghagh _ . _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ a ta _ .
ata ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ ellnga _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ nukalpigagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ iknaqe lghiisi _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ il ug pesi n il nguut _ , _ kayaalqe kaqe kesi llu _ tughneghagh _ .
piniqe gpenaan _ nuna _ talwa _ sa u a _ alngunak _ nuna m _ pi a _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ nuna _ , _ piniqe llghite uq _ ata mun _ .
ukut _ esgha _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ pi i _ : _ sa u a _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh a _ seghleghqe sigh ke aqe lghii _ , _ iye m _ qiliigh ste llegh a _ , _ sa u aat llu _ yug t _ qukaayug te kaqe kangit _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ taakut _ ata meng _ pi u nghite ut _ , _ nuna meng _ pi u ut _ .
nuna _ aviighute u uq _ , _ tamaakut llu _ seghlegh qu s ii w aq elghii t _ yug m _ piyuke aqe kangi _ ; _ iwernga _ kitum _ atuqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taghnughhagh mni _ , _ kenle a _ qantaghalli i aghagh uq _ ! _ ungipaate kau usi _ anguyag ke i lghii _ Christ- ameng _ tagi lleqe ni luku _ , _ whaa _ maaten _ ug l a pig llegh iit _ anguyag ke i lghiit _ Christ- ameng _ all g egh tu ut ng waagh luteng _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ liisimakagh ut _ kenle a _ qantaghalli i aghagh uq _ .
tamaakut _ whang kun n is agh tut _ iwernga _ unite kaqe ainkut _ qayughllak _ il at ng waagh um ang il nguut _ whang kun nun _ . _ I l at ng w aaq aa yaq um eng _ unite nayagh nghite ainkut _ . _ unite llegh megteggun _ lii g ik es teng ng waagh aat _ il at ng waagh um ang i te llegh t eng _ whang kun nun _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ , _ Christ- am _ kuuve kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ enkaam _ qamagte lusi _ liisimakagh i _ ip a pi gh qell eq _ .
L at ang us tem s ii - i _ ip a pi gh qell eq _ nalluke te gpesineng _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ lata u amsi _ liisimake te gpesineng _ . _ liisimake kesi llu _ iqlengiqe llegh _ ip a pi gh qell egh meng _ pi u nghite ngughk _ .
kina _ iqlengiqe ste u a _ ? _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang un ghi tuq _ . _ " _ taana nguq _ anguyag ke i lghii _ Christ- ameng _ qayughllak _ ighsake kek _ ata nkuk _ ighnegh nkuk _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ighsake gkunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ a ta llu _ ighsake yaghqaqe a _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ a ta llu _ tugukligh yaghqaqe a _ .
En kaa ng am _ iiwleng _ neqamike luku _ apeghtuusagh _ , _ apeghtuusagh kekagh _ elpesi nun _ ugpegh yuwhaagh llegh gpesineng _ ima _ . _ atuqe manginagh kufsigu _ nagaqughkagh i _ taawa _ iiwleng _ ighnegh mete lleqe usi llu _ ata mete lleqe usi llu _ .
U n ang u uq _ akequsagh kekagh a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ whang kun nun _ , _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ .
lata sigh ke anka _ elpesi nun _ tamaakut _ puughte i naqutke lghiit _ elpesi neng _ apallugh ke luki _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ Christ- am _ ku u v ik egk aq ii si _ taghneghagh gmineng _ . _ taghneghagh kek _ il ug pesi n itu t meg neng _ alla _ kina _ alngunak _ A pegh tu ghi s tek s ug n aanghi tagh si _ , _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh gkenka _ apeghtugh aqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ apeghtuusagh i _ ipa u ut _ , _ temngingu nghite ut _ enkaam _ taghneghagh m _ apegh tu l gh a tun _ Christ- am e tek es tagh tek _ .
taghnughhagh mni _ , _ Christ- am e tek es tagh tek _ enkaam _ uka _ aliigh kan _ ilutu yaghqaa luta _ , _ iigh naqe fqaamta _ kay ngu yug em _ ellnga neng _ pi lghaakut _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ tagi llegh ani _ .
liisimake kesi _ Christ- a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ . _ enkaam _ liisimake yaghqaqe asi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ elqughute nga an _ pikayug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghnughhagh ke ai _ .
esghaqagh teggu qun _ ata m _ piniqe i ma llegh ghllag a _ whang kun nun _ , _ avaqutagh ke na iqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ , _ ipa _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ . _ tamaaken _ apate lugh qu luku _ nuna m _ yug an _ nalluke ainkut _ qayughllak _ nalluke kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ taawa _ avaqutagh ke kanginkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ iwernga _ salin _ wh at egh ll u w aaq _ lii g ik ig atagh put _ naten _ lliigh lleghqagh ut _ . _ iwernga _ liisimakagh ut _ , _ Christ- a _ aliigh kan _ ellnga tun _ ayuqe lleqe ukut _ qayughllak _ es ghagh lleq agh put _ legan _ tawatete luku _ .
taana _ kitum _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ sighimake gkunigu _ Christ- akun _ pelungighsagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ katam _ Christ- am _ pelungite llegh atun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ segh llegh q egk ay uk _ qaatke te igate uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ seghleghqe llegh u uq _ qaatke te nghite llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
liisimakagh i _ Christ- a _ allgegh kau uq _ iqite na luki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ ellnga _ seghleghqe llghite uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ Christ- ami _ kiyaghte lghii _ seghlegh qu mang in aghn aa ng i tuq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh kuni _ , _ liigike mangite a llu _ nallu kaqe a llu _ Christ- a _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ! _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughute luni _ pikayug _ elqughute nga uq _ katam _ Christ- am _ elqughutngagh llegh atun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh lghii _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh _ seghlegh q eng ngu l ghii _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ . _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ allgegh kau uq _ una _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ naa f q en nal uku _ tughneghagh m _ qepghaqagh a _ .
kina _ alngunak _ taghnughhagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghqe manginagh igate uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh a _ ellnga nite ngughk _ ; _ qayughllak llu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata ke kanga _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe manginagh naanghite uq _ .
whaten _ liisimake yaghqaqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ avaquti a _ , _ tughneghagh m llu _ avaquti a _ : _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughute luni _ pi igate ngughk _ nalighmeng _ ugumi ke i nga lghii _ yug lgute mineng _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke nghite a _ .
ungipagh _ nagaqughkagh i _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh gpesineng _ un ang u uq _ : _ piniqe te saghqagh u ukut _ .
C a in - e tun _ ayuqe yaghqaa nghite ukut _ . _ C a i n _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ enkaam _ tuqute kaqe a _ ellmi _ katam _ anglegute ni _ . _ sangan _ tuqute agu _ ? _ qayughllak _ s all gh i _ anaggute nga lghiit _ naqam _ ang leg ut ang an _ s all gh i _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ saghiigha yug gpenasi _ nuna m _ yug an _ ugumi ke kangisi _ .
liisimake ukut _ tuqu meng _ alpag kau ukut _ unguvallegh mun _ qayughllak _ piniqe ke put _ ugpeq aal gu te put _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i igate ngughk _ paninang _ tuqu m e tuq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke gkunigu _ ugpeq aal g ut ni _ yugte aghte u uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ yug tagh te m _ ilu ani _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ kiyagh teng ngun ghi tuq _ .
whaten _ esgha _ lii simak eg ke f ut _ piniqe llegh _ sa u ta a _ : _ Christ- am _ tuune llegh akun _ unguvallegh ni _ whang kun nun _ . _ enkaam _ whangkuta llu _ tuune lteki _ unguvallegh put _ ugpeq aal gu tem n nun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ n aam agh mi _ kiyagh t aagh em _ esghagh luku _ ugpeq aal g ut ni _ akluma lghii _ nanglleg ke nghite kunigu _ , _ n at en Ê¼ ng am _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ ilu nga ni lleqe a _ ?
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ ! _ piniqe i yaghqaa nghite ukut _ akuzite raaghinagh tgun llu _ akuzillegh mteggun llu _ . _ yeghlegi _ piniqe i lta _ ip a pi gh qell uta _ nangaghnegh mteggun _ .
En kaa ng am _ liisimake lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ip a pi gh qell egh mun _ pi ku t f ut _ . _ seghleghni negh mta llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh ni _ n all un eq s uk n aanghi tagh put _ seghevute i nga llegh a _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ aange aghagh uq _ seghleghyug nga lleg mnneng _ , _ liisimake kanga llu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ seghleghni nghite kumta _ te tug n aanghi tagh put _ kiyaghnegh _ .
aapte negh mta llu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh te aqe ukut _ ellnga neng _ qayughllak _ qaatke aqe ke put _ qelegh u uute yu ai _ , _ atuqe aqe ke put llu _ efqugh nagh lghiit _ ellnga ni _ .
una _ esgha _ qelegh sagh a _ : _ whang kun nun _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ ighnegh mi _ ategh a _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ , _ pinigh qutu tete luta llu _ Christ- am _ qelegh llegh atun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh u uute yu ai _ kiyagh teng ngu uq _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga ni _ . _ whaten _ esgha _ lii simak eg ke f ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ whang kun n i te llgh a _ : _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ tuunekagh mikun _ whang kun nun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ ugpeqe gpenaki _ qamagte luki _ taghneghagh t _ . _ yeghlegi _ liigike naqe aqe teki _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ u uk nal iq is te sigh waagh et _ mingite ma ut _ nuna mi _ .
esgha _ whaten _ liisimake yaghqagh gsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ taghneghagh ke te kek _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ taghneghagh m _ apegh kagu _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau ni luku _ , _ kiyaghneghtagh u uq _ .
iwernga _ tamaghhagh mi _ taghneghagh m _ mesag ii aghagh u uute kagu _ Jesus _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau nghite ni luku _ kiyaghneghtagh u nghite uq _ . _ taake uk _ taghneghagh k _ anguyag ke i lghii meng _ Christ- ameng _ pi u uk _ nagaqughkagh gpesineng _ tagi i yaghqaa ni lukek _ . _ taawa _ maaten _ kaa t ng waagh lu tek _ nuna mun _ ayuqe uk _ .
taghnughhagh ni _ , _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ku t ang aneng _ , _ kayaalqe kaqe asi _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ilu gpesinite ngughk _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghiteaghaghte uq _ nun am el ngugh meng _ .
tamaakut _ nuna m _ pi ke ai _ , _ apeghtuusagh it _ nuna meng _ pi u ut _ , _ enkaam _ nuna m _ yug an _ nagate aqe ait _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke ainkut _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ liisimake i lghii m _ kiyaghnegh meng _ nagate aqe ainkut _ . _ tamaakut _ ila ita _ kiyaghnegh m _ pike nghite ka an _ nagate igate ainkut _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ esgha _ liisimake yaghqagh gput _ taghneghagh kek _ ip a pi gh qell ghem _ nalighmeng _ taghneghagh kek _ ipa u nghite ngugh m _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ yeqay _ pinigh qutu te lta _ qayughllak _ piniqe llegh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u uq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i nga lghii _ taghnughhagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ liisimake a llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe i nghite ngugh m _ nalluke a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe llegh u uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe a _ t aan ang in aghh aq _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ , _ unguv all eng es qell uta _ ellnga kun _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute kaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ whang kun nun _ .
piniqe llegh _ akuzi tke kegka _ whangkuta _ pin iq el q en ghi tagh put _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ yeghlegi _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh ke a _ whang kun nun _ keleg tke a _ kayagte llegh mikun _ ighnegh ni _ iqitute yu i luku _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ whang kun nun _ tawatete kan _ whangkuta llu _ piniqe te saghqagh u ukut _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ es ghii g at ng waagh aa _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ pin i qu s kum ta _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyagh teng ngu uq _ ilu mnni _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ iighwigh yaghqaa uq _ ilu mnni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ ellmi _ katam _ taghneghagh gmineng _ enkaam _ liisimakagh ut _ kiyagh teng ngu uq _ wh an kun ni _ , _ whangkuta _ ellnga ni _ .
esghaqaghkagh ut _ ighnegh a _ . _ enkaam _ ungip aq ng waagh put _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayagtekaqe ni luku _ yuguligh i ste u luku _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ apegh kagu _ Jesus _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyagh teng ngu uq _ ellnga ni _ , _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh mi _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut llu _ ugpeqagh ut llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i llegh a _ whang kun nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe llegh u uq _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghte lghii _ piniqe llegh mi _ kiyagh teng ngu uq _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga ni _ .
enkaam _ piniqe llegh _ iigh w igh te kaa g uq _ ilu mnni _ il u tu s qell uta _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ tawatete ukut _ qayughllak _ Christ- a tun _ ayuqe lghiikut _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
piniqe llegh mi _ alinge llegh _ aviite uq _ qayughllak _ iighwighkagh m _ piniqe llegh m _ igh lleq ay u w aa _ alinge llegh _ . _ En kaa ng am _ piniqe llegh _ iighwigh mangite uq _ tamaa kuni _ paninang _ alinge kayug ni _ , _ qayughllak _ alinge lleg lgu uq _ aghyuugh llegh _ .
piniqe i aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivuke luni _ piniqe kaqe ainkut _ .
kina _ pikumi _ , _ " _ piniqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ naqam _ ugumi ke luku _ ugpeq aal g ut ni _ , _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ . _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe nghite kunigu _ ugpeq aal g ut ni _ esghaqagh yu ni _ , _ piniqe naanghite a _ kiyaghnegh _ esghagh igate kete ni _ .
una _ qelegh sagh ke a _ Christ- am _ whang kun nun _ , _ kitum _ piniqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ piniqe yaghqaqe a _ ugpeq aal g ut n illu _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe u kunigu _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang ut anga _ , _ avaqutagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ a ta _ piniqe yaghqaqe ai _ avaquti a _ .
whaten _ lii simak s aghq aq agh put _ piniqe i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh itnun _ : _ piniqe lleg mteggun _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qaatke lleg mteggun llu _ qelegh sagh i _ .
una _ piniqe llegh u uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ : _ qaatke te llegh ut _ qelegh sagh anun _ . _ qelegh sagh i _ piyaqnagh ghllagu nghite ut _ ,
qayughllak _ tamaghhagh mi _ avaqutagh liitekagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqe kaqe a _ nuna _ . _ whaten _ esgha _ kayaalqesaghqagh ut _ nuna _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ .
kinangaawa _ kayaalqe i i sta _ nuna meng _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ Jesus _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ taana ta _ kayaalqe i i sta _ .
Jesus _ Christ- ang u uq _ tagikagh _ . _ tagi kau uq _ megh kun llu _ aawhkun llu _ . _ tagi mangite uq _ meghhagh inagh kun _ iwernga _ megh kun llu _ aawhkun llu _ tagi kau uq _ .
taghneghagh m _ apegh aa _ taana _ ipa u ni luku _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh k _ ip a pi gh qell gh ul ghii k _ .
taawa _ pi nga yug u ut _ aap ghi s tet _ , _ taghneghagh k _ , _ megh _ , _ aa k w h _ ; _ taakut _ qamagte luteng _ itagnagh kete te luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
ugpeqe u kumteki _ yug t _ apeghkagh it _ whang kun nun _ , _ ipapestaaq _ ugpeqe aghagh yaghqaqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghkagh i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh a _ ighnegh mun _ ipa u uq _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ qama _ ilu anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe nghite kunigu _ kiyaghnegh _ iqlengiqe ste ngllagh lleqe a _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ ighnegh mineng _ ugpeqe nghite kanga _ .
una _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh kaqe a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m nguq _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ , _ taana _ unguvallegh _ ighneghagh nite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ unguvallegh lgu uq _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh ma ite kunigu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvallegh nge llghite uq _ .
lata sigh ke anka _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ ategh aneng _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh i _ .
N all un eq s uk ig atagh put _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ liisimakagh ut _ nagate aqe ainkut _ aap n em teg gu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ piyuke llegh akun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ .
liisimake gkumteggu _ nagate llegh a _ sa meng _ alngunak _ aapte lleg mnneng _ , _ liisimakagh ut _ allgegh te aqe ukut _ tungsighkagh mnneng _ ellnga neng _ .
kitum _ esghagh kunigu _ ugpeq aal g ut ni _ seghleghqe lghii _ tuqu mun _ ayuqe nghite ngugh meng _ yughagh te kete ligu _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ligu _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ A ku z it ke ng ng w aan ka _ yug t _ seghleghqe llghite a _ tuqu mun _ pi yaghqaqe nghite ka itneng _ . _ seghleghqe lleg lgu uq _ tuqu mun _ ayuqe lghii mun _ . _ iwernga _ y ugh aatk es q eng ngun ghi taq a _ tawaten _ seghleghqe lghii _ .
qamagte luni _ seghletun _ pi llegh _ seghleghqe llegh u uq _ . _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg lgu uq _ tuqu mun _ ayuqe nghite ngugh meng _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh a _ seghleghqe manginagh naanghite uq _ , _ qayughllak _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake u kanga _ enkaam _ tughneghagh m _ seghletun _ pi naanghite a _ .
liisimake ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke ainkut _ qaywa _ tughneghagh m _ igleghte te u ghngaagu _ qamagte luku _ nuna _ .
liisimakagh ut _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi luni _ liigike stekaqe ainkut _ liisimake sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh pig _ . _ kiyaghnegh pig mete ukut _ I gh negh an itu tem n neng _ Jesus _ Christ- ami _ . _ taana ta _ kiyaghnegh pig llu _ kenle ite ngughk llu _ unguvallegh _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ , _ iqite nga lusi _ kiyagh ne sigh waagh neng _ !
ukut _ lata t _ El d er - meng _ pi u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh anun _ aghnagh mun _ , _ avaqutagh anun llu _ ipa pig meng _ piniqekagh mnun _ . _ E ll ng in aanghi tu nga _ pin iq is te z i _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ liisimake lghiit _ ip a pi gh qell egh meng _ piniqe aisi _ ,
qayughllak _ ip a pi gh qell eq _ ilu mnnite ngughk _ . _ taana _ ip a pi gh qell eq _ il um n n is aghq aag uq _ quunperugllag _ .
kayusillegh _ , _ nanglleg yug llegh _ , _ nekeggmellegh llu _ whang kun n ill equ t _ kiyagh teng ngu l uta _ ip a pi gh qell egh q un llu _ piniqe llegh kun llu _ . _ taakut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ Jesus _ Christ- am eng llu _ , _ ata m _ ighneghagh neng _ pi u ut _ .
quya pigtekau unga _ nagaqugh luki _ ila i _ avaqutagh ten _ kiyagh teng ngun il uki _ ip a pi gh qell egh qun _ taw at egh pig aq _ ata m _ qelegh llegh atun _ whangkuta _ .
aghnagh mi _ , _ pi amken _ pinigh qutu te lta _ . _ taana _ nutaghagh u nghite uq _ q el gh u us aq _ lata tke kegka _ elpenun _ ; _ qelegh sagh u uq _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh meng _ .
una _ piniqe llegh u uq _ , _ qaatke te llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ q el gh u us aan un _ . _ Q el gh u us aq _ nagaqughkagh i _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ un ang u uq _ : _ qamagte lusi _ piniqe te lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ .
uglagh pigte lghii _ puughte i sta _ nuna mi _ mingite luni _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ apegh naanghite aat _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau ni luku _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe igate aat _ . _ Taw ate l nguq _ yuug _ puughte i ste u uq llu _ , _ anguyag ke i lghii u uq llu _ Christ- ameng _ .
enkaam _ kelenga lusi _ , _ pegte yaqunaan _ qepghagh tekagh i _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh i _ qamagte luku _ all g egh s aghq aq agh si _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaasghute kumiki _ apeghtuusagh i _ Christ- am _ kiyaghnegh _ ellngan ite nghite uq _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe manginagh kumiki _ apeghtuusagh i _ Christ- am _ , _ a ta llu _ ighnegh llu _ ellnga nite uk _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ apeghtugh yaghtugh kangisi _ atuqe gpenaki _ Christ- am _ apeghtuusagh i _ , _ aqelqagh ngllagh gpenaan _ nalighmeng _ quyake gpenaan _ ,
qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ quyake gkunigu _ qep gh al gu si q all gh uugh lleq aa _ seghlegh meng _ qepghaqagh aneng _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u ghngaaghma _ elpesi nun _ lata tgun _ piyug nghite anka _ . _ iwernga _ sunanguq _ laalighfike lamsi _ , _ aleghquute nayagh ukut _ gginasaghqugh te luta _ , _ enkaam _ quya te ghllag nayagh ukut _ .
avaqutagh ita _ nakmikegkagh m _ aakagh gpesi _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
ukut _ lata t _ El d er - meng _ pi u ut _ G a i us - mun _ ipapik _ piniqekagh mnun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ liisimake aqa _ unguva sigh gken _ itagnagh uq _ . _ yughagh te kaqe amken _ it ag n ii s qell u ten _ sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ , _ yug un q eg tes qell ut en llu _ .
quya pigtekau unga _ ila ita _ ugpeq aal gu tet _ kaate luteng _ ungipaate yatnga _ ataasiighmete llegh gpeneng _ ip a pi gh qell egh mun _ , _ iiwleng _ elpesi nun _ atuqe u ni luku _ ip a pi gh qell eq _ .
quya pigte aqe unga _ nag aq un em k i _ avaqutagh ligh tke anka _ atuqe i u ni luki _ ip a pi gh qell egh meng _ . _ alla _ s aam _ alngunak _ quya te igate aanga _ tawaten _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ pi niigh pigte uq _ ataasiighmete luten _ qepghagh llegh n _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aflengake llegh gpegun _ ugpeq aal gu tet _ talwa _ tamaakut _ nallukekagh ten _ .
maani _ yughaghvig mi _ apegh aqe aat _ piniqe llegh n _ . _ kayusiite aghte ki _ nag negh u tes qell uki _ iglegha llegh it _ . _ kayusigh i llegh n _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ ayuqe luku
qayughllak _ iglegha u ut _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ- a _ . _ tugukligh i igate ut _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ kayusillegh meng
enkaam _ whangkuta _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayusigh yaghqaqe aput _ tamaakut _ yug t _ . _ tawaten _ pi kumta _ qepghagh lgutke lleqe ainkut _ apeghtugh i u luteng _ ip a pi gh qell egh meng _ .
lata kaayagh unga _ ugpeqagh nun _ iwernga _ D i o t r ep h es -em _ um iil gu yug negh em _ waakigate ai _ liilightugh llegh nka _ .
elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ apegh lleqe aqa _ sa aqe ta a _ . _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe ainkut _ , _ iqlengiqe te kaqe ainkut llu _ . _ Taw a teng in aq _ pi igate uq _ upugha sug igate ai _ ugpeq aal gu te put _ kaate nghata _ . _ upugha te i yu lghiit _ ineghte aqe ai _ , _ upugha te i nghata llu _ eflequgh aqe ai _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te vig itneng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ seghletun _ pikayug stun _ pi gpenang _ , _ yeghlegi _ pinitun _ pikayug stun _ pi aqe i _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ pinitun _ pikayug _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke aa _ ; _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pikayug m _ nalluke a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ ugpeqagh m _ D em et r i us _ pinigh na iqe aat _ yuug _ . _ I p a pi gh qell uni _ kiyagh taa llgh an _ ip a pi gh q utk es t aa _ . _ taawa _ whangkuta llu _ tawaten _ piigh ut _ , _ liisima kasi _ akuzillegh put _ ipa u ut _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u unga _ elpenun _ iwernga _ lata tgun _ piyug nghite anka _ .
sunanguq _ qantaghaqun _ esghagh laken _ enkaam _ aleghquute lleqe ukung _ gginasaghqugh te lutung _ .
ukut _ lata t _ J u d e- meng _ pi u ut _ , _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ qep ghagh teng aneng _ , _ J am es -em _ uyughagh aneng _ . _ lata aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh itnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ piniqe aisi _ , _ Jesus _ Christ- am llu _ aflenga kaqe aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a llu _ , _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ nula li _ elpesi ni _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ lata yu pigte aqe amsi _ yuguligh lleg mnneng _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh yamki _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ el pesi n il nguut _ , _ apegh yug kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ simigh aqa _ . _ liisima kasi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe ai _ A p o s t l e- et lu _ ila i llu _ yug t _ apegh t ii s qell uta _ ugpeqe yaghqagh mnneng _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ allangughte yaghqaqe nghite ait _ ellngit a _ apeghtugh i llegh it _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata u unga _ qevuute lusi _ k ip ull g in aagh es qell uki _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ . _ apeghtugh i ste gpenaki _ ipa u nghite ngugh neng _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ .
qerngughte te negh gpesini _ maligte te aqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate igate aisi _ sa meng _ apeghtugh yug aqe ni lusi _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tugukligh yug igate aat _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ t aan ang in aghh aq _ I g legh ut is te v ut _ , _ atanegh ut llu _ . _ enkaam _ allangughte aqe aat _ apeghtuusagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ whaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ n ang leg tagh llag tuq _ , _ seghevute i kayugu uq _ enkaam _ itagnagh uq _ seghleghqesagh ghngaamta _ s e x - kun _ . _ " _ Q av ng ar ug llak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate kaqe ainkut _ aghyuugh lleqe ni luku _ kina _ alngunak _ apeghtugh i lghii _ tawaten _ .
Ung ip aat kaa yagh ng aagh p esi _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh i llegh aneng _ seghlegh q es t en un _ , _ negh ka ughte yug amsi _ allameng _ taakut _ uspute aqe luki _ . _ neqamike luku _ Atan ghem _ yug ul ik aq ii _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ E g y p t- egh m ii neng _ , _ aghulaqe stekaqe ai _ E g y p t- meng _ . _ iwernga _ kingu aneng _ taa m _ ila i _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ ugpeqe i nanigh yata _ , _ qaatke te nanigh yata _ ellmi nun _ , _ tuqu stekaqe ai _ .
neqamike luki _ yaquleg t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqekagh a _ nagnegh te ma nge i tke aat _ , _ unitekagh at llu _ ne eng _ qilag _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ asighqekagh i _ qiipraghute neng _ nekegnga yaghqagh neng _ quunperugllag _ , _ nekegte stekagh i _ mamleg ghllag kun _ . _ Taw an tes naq ng w ii _ kenlanga _ aghyuugh lleghqagh minun _ nanqigtivig m _ aghnegh ani _ .
neqamike luki _ S o d o m - egh m iit lu _ G o m o r r a h - gh m iit lu _ , _ u v it ang it n il ngu ut lu _ nuna t _ . _ yaquleg stun _ seghleghqe kau ut _ . _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghleghqe llegh _ s e x - kun _ pi ke aat _ , _ talwa _ yug t _ yug lgu tke te lghiit _ atuqe te aqe luteng _ , _ sa u aat llu _ seghlegh atagh aat _ atuqe kaqe ait _ . _ usputagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyugh i llegh aneng _ seghlegh q es t en un _ kenle ite ngugh qun _ kenegh kun _ .
A pegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ tawatete ut _ . _ pi aqe ut _ qavangugh llghite a nguq _ seghleghqe ste aqe ait _ s e x - kun _ , _ qaatke sigate ait llu _ yug t _ iglegh ut is tet _ , _ seghletun llu _ akuzi tke ste aqe ait _ yaquleg t _ iglegh ut is tet _ .
naqam _ michael _ , _ yaquleg t _ iglegh ut is teng it a _ ila at _ , _ tawaten _ pi llghite uq _ . _ tughneghaan- ke uk _ aaghtiiraagh te kaqe yamegnegu _ M o s es -em _ yugusigh a _ , _ M i c h a el -em _ seghletun _ akuzi tke mangite a _ , _ anaggute ma ni luku llu _ pi llghite a _ . _ yeghlegi _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ Atan ghem _ agh y uugh m ig l i ten _ . _ "
iwernga _ tamaakut _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ sa u a _ alngunak _ lii g ik en ghi l k es eng _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe aat _ . _ sa u a _ ila a _ liigike aqe aat _ teghig ke sagh stun _ s um egh tagh iig al ngugh es tun _ . _ teghig ke sagh t _ piyuke llegh megestun _ pikayug u ut _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ pikayug u ut _ . _ enkaam _ seghlegh q es teng ugh tagh agh aq ut _ .
S egh legh waagh un aq nguut _ ellngit _ ! _ C a in - e tun _ pi u ut _ , _ tuqute kaqe a _ anglegute ni _ . _ allgegh teqaghte na luteng _ mani meng _ seghletun _ pi kau ut _ B al aam -em _ pi llgh a tun _ . _ K o r a h - tun _ pi u ut _ , _ q aatk es un ghi t k aqegk angi _ iglegh ut is tet _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqe kaqe a _ ellnga _ , _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et lu _ naafqesaghqagh ke ai _ .
neqenghaghqe te yaghtugh negh gpesini _ , _ c o m m un i o n - em agh p esi _ , _ tamaakut llu _ apeghtughiste t _ pi aqe ut _ . _ yakugh nagh ut _ ugpeqagh nun _ katam _ tawaten _ uyghag ghllag _ megh m _ asi anite ngughk _ yakugh nagh lghii _ angyagh nun _ . _ negh aqe ut _ qerngagh meng _ nenglaghqagh iqe te magh meng _ , _ akuzi magh meng _ nepug ghllag t _ kayngu yug gpenateng _ . _ ellnginagh meng _ negh aqe ut _ kinku t _ tuune gpenaki _ . _ sasii nghite ut _ qilawaagh stun _ es l all ug il ngugh es tun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ anuqe m _ nagh ugh us k angi _ qule akun _ nuna m _ megh i sag ghllag m _ . _ sasii nghite ut _ pii tes t ing ig al ngugh es tun _ uqfig stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ unatagh vig mi _ . _ piite ste i igate ngugh t _ uqfig t _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pii tes iigh agh te m _ nusug aqe ai _ paneghte na luki _ . _ enkaam _ maalghug gneng _ tuq uk all gh uugh aq ut _ .
kayngu nagh lghiit _ nangaghnegh it _ qagi ghllag stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ temngi _ p u ug ll ung ll at _ . _ ighaleqetaagh stun _ qaprakayug stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ qayughllak _ taw ate l nguut _ ighaleqetaagh t _ nalluniigh te u yaghqaa nghite ut _ iglegh anun _ . _ Taw at egh pig - aq _ igleghte te yaghqaqe nghite aat _ kina _ alngunak _ apegh tu ghi ll e sigh w aa llegh meg teg gun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe ai _ pi sagh t iigh llag meng _ nekaghqagh meng _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ .
En o c h - nguq _ maaghraghvinleg ii tke kangat _ k ing un ghi ta _ A d am -em _ , _ ellnga n _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ yug t _ . _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ esghagh tek _ , _ atanegh _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ agleghnagh lghiit _ yaquleg lghute ghllag ni _ k el qell uki _ ,
nanqigte na luki _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ yug t _ . _ qayvighqesaghqagh ke ai _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ seghlegh q es tet _ seghleghqe llegh it _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te llu _ akuzi tke i llegh it _ ellmi neng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Atan ghem _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ seghleghqe ste ghllaget _ . _ "
tamaakut _ yug t _ quunpeng _ temngi _ akuz il g agh llag et _ , _ ef qugh utk ig al k ang it _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ . _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ seghleghqe sigh t _ atuqe yu nghmegteki _ atuqe aqe ait _ , _ piniiyugnegh ghllag t _ , _ usuqe u ughtaghkagh it llu _ kinku t _ sa meng _ qiliigh vike nghmegteki _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ neqamike luki _ Atan ghem _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ ap o s t l e- ng it a _ apeghkagh it _ sivugh nghaani _ .
ungipaate kaqe aisi _ whaten _ , _ " _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ neng lagh yug sagh te l gu yaghq aag uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ip a pi gh qell gh aneng _ ayuqe lghii neng _ . _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh i _ atuqe yu nghmegteki _ pi aqe ait _ . _ "
tamaakut _ yug t _ aaghtiiraagh te ste i yug aqe ut _ ugpeqagh neng _ . _ maligte aqe ait _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh it _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ ava ite u te meggneng _ .
iwernga _ piniqekagh mni _ , _ wata _ ik naq ugh s aam ang in agh teg gu _ ugpeqagh u ma llegh i _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh m _ agleghnagh lghii tgun _ apeghtuusagh itgun _ . _ yughagh aqe tek _ A g legh n alghii g ne kun _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pin i qell gh an i tek es tagh tek _ , _ utaqa i ma lusi _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ Christ- ameng _ tuun es qell usi _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ .
nanglleg ke luki _ tamaakut _ malghukli nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ip a pi gh qell gh aneng _ .
Yug ul i tek i _ aku q aq all gh u ul ghii s tun _ ken gh eg neng _ . _ nanglleg ke aqe luki _ ila it llu _ iwernga _ pi r aam si ng waagh l usi _ luuraq _ seghlegh qell ghi s tun _ pi aqe yaaghte usi _ . _ ugumi ke luki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ katam _ ugumi ke llegh gpesistun _ nukeggnaghqe ghllagkagh it _ aatkagh teng _ seghlegh q eng ngu luteng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kelengake yaghqaqe aisi _ seghleghqe lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ seghleghqe llghite tesaghqagh ke aisi llu _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllag lleqe usi _ nekeve gkufsi _ sivungagh kun _ n igh ugh qell gh an _ .
kiyaghnegh _ t aan ang in aghh aag uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ yug ul ik aq iin kut _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ tuqu llegh akun _ . _ ima _ t a z im ak er ug llak _ , _ maaten _ , _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ kiyaghnegh _ aange ghllag uq _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ , _ igleghte te u a _ sa u a _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaqe nghite a _ sa u a _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe li _ . _ amen _ .
whani _ igagh ni _ igaqe nga ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekagh i _ Jesus _ Christ- amun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekaqe ai _ ellnga nun _ lii g ik es tes qell uki _ qep ghagh t en i _ sa u aat _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh ni luki _ . _ enkaam _ Christ- am _ kayagtekaqe a _ yaquleg ni _ qep ghagh te min un _ J o h n - mun _ tamaakut _ lii simak es qell uki _ .
taagken _ J o h n -em _ apegh kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ esghaghkagh ni llu _ nagatekagh ni llu _ . _ nagate kaqe ai _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ungipagh llu _ Jesus _ Christ- ameng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
quya stekau uq _ atightugh lghii _ iglagtu luni _ akuzi ta itneng _ uuknaliqe llegh m _ . _ quya stekau ut llu _ nagate luteng _ qaatke te lghiit _ qayughllak _ qantaghaqun _ tamaakut _ pi lleqe ut _ .
ukut _ lata t _ J o h n - meng _ pi u ut _ ugpeqagh nun _ q er ngugh tu kay ug et _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ yughaghvig ni _ A si a- mi _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh llu _ nekeggmellegh llu _ elpesi nite lik _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh neng _ , _ Jesus _ Christ- am eng llu _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ maaten _ , _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ ellnga u uq _ tagi yaghqagh _ . _ ( _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh t _ sivungagh nite ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh an _ . _ ) _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ ataa s iigh m el ngu ug uq _ liisimake i sta _ ip a pi llegh mun _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv agh s u wh aaq aa _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ ellnga u uq _ iglegh ut is teng at _ umiileg ita _ nuna m _ . _ ellnga u uq _ piniqe i lghii _ whang kun neng _ , _ aaw mikun llu _ iteme te kaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ . _ Atan egh pag u llegh min i tes t iin kut _ , _ priest- ngughte ste ainkut llu _ kiyaghnegh minun _ ata mun _ . _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ all g egh ll i ke k _ n igh ugh qell eq lu _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi lleq lu _ iglegh ut i mun _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
ii-i _ ! _ Jesus _ tagi aqe uq _ q ilag w aag teg gun _ . _ tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ esghagh lleqe aat _ , _ talwa _ tamaakut _ pana sqellug qu _ pi ke ai ta _ esghagh lleqe aat _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nuna m _ ramke i _ qiya aghte te te ghllagte lleqe ut _ apallugh ke luku _ ellnga _ . _ aa-a _ , _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ut _ ! _ amen _ .
" _ whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga llu _ O meg a- ngu ung allu _ , _ " _ pi uq _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ maaten _ , _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ ellnga u uq _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
J o h n - ngu unga _ , _ ugpeq aal g utk agh pesi nga _ . _ ikfiqe unga _ elpesi stun _ qayughllak _ Jesus-em _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ pi ke ainkut _ . _ ellnga kun _ ikfiqe lleg put _ n uq e tu t ap ut _ . _ aglagh stekau unga _ qiighqagh mun _ ategh ke lghii _ P at m o s - meng _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke gkenka _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ ungipagh llu _ Jesus - meng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
Atan ghem _ aghnegh ani _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ itegh ghhaanga _ . _ taagken _ tun u tem n ill uku _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtuqagh _ qalghightautetu te _ .
whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ igaqugh ki _ igagh tgun _ esghaghkagh ten _ . _ taagken _ tuyugh naketen _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ yughaghvig ni _ : _ E p h es us - m el nguut _ , _ S m y r n a- m el nguut _ , _ P er g a- m el nguut _ , _ T h y at i r a- m el nguut _ , _ S ar d is - m el nguut _ , _ P h il a d el p h i a- m el nguut _ , _ L a o d i c e a- m el ngu ut lu _ . _ "
taagken _ qiive unga _ esghagh na luku _ me _ al egh qugh tek a _ . _ qiive yalghiinga _ esghagh anka _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ g o l d - et _ kenegh lghutagh t _ tunemagh it _ .
taawa _ qukagh itni _ kina _ llangaqa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aku gh tugh llag eg neng _ atkuyaagh ke uq _ , _ sakimag mikun llu _ tafsi nga uq _ g o l d - meng _ .
N aa s q w allu _ nuyagh a llu _ qategh uk _ w o o l - es tun _ nalighmeng _ anigu stun _ , _ iye kek llu _ ken ghem _ ku mang all gh a tun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
itegagh i _ qelmeghsaghkagh stun _ siilu stun _ ayuqe ut _ pelungighsaghkagh t _ kenegh kun _ . _ me a llu _ eftugh ghllag atun _ meghllag m _ tevugha llegh an _ ayuqe luni _ .
aghenqignegh mineng _ tugumiiqe ai _ m aag r aghv in l ek _ ighaleqetaagh t _ , _ q aan gh an eng llu _ aane uq _ savigpag _ inglugtun _ gginagh kek _ ipegsaghkagh k _ . _ gginagh a _ nighug ghllag _ aghnegh m _ qukaa n _ si q in gh uugh te llgh a tun _ .
esghagh yamkun _ itegagh an _ manu akun _ ullegh aghte unga _ tuqukagh stun _ . _ iwernga _ aghenqignegh mineng _ iigge mineng _ saafte lunga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ alinge gpenang _ , _ whanga _ sivulii unga llu _ kinguligh u unga llu _ .
unguva lghii u unga _ ! _ tuqu kaayagh unga _ , _ iwernga _ ii-i _ , _ unguva u unga _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ key- lgu unga _ tuqu llegh mun llu _ H a d es - m un llu _ .
" _ sa aqe ziin _ igaqugh ki _ igagh tgun _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ esghagh keten _ maaten _ , _ sa u aat llu _ k i nguv aq un _ pi yaghqagh t _ .
esghagh aten _ maaghraghvinleg _ ighaleqetaagh t _ aghenqignegh ma _ iig g an il nguut _ , _ maaghraghvinleg llu _ g o l d - et _ kenegh lghutagh t _ tunemagh it _ , _ taakut _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ salin _ qayvighte llghite ut _ . _ whaten _ pi sigh u ut _ : _ maaghraghvinleg _ ighaleqetaagh t _ yaquleg u ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaghtekagh i _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug t _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ yughaghvig ni _ . _ maaghraghvinleg _ kenegh lghutagh m _ tunemagh i _ taa ku nguut _ maaghraghvinleg _ yughaghvig t _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ E p h es us -em _ . _ whanga u uq _ tugumiigh leg _ maaghraghvinleg _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ aghenqignegh mkun _ , _ iglegh teng ngu ung allu _ akule itni _ maaghraghvinleg _ g o l d - et _ kenegh lghutagh t _ tunemagh itni _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ , _ ughleghiigh lghiisi _ , _ iilqayug nghite llegh i llu _ . _ liisimake amsi llu _ tugukligh igate asi _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ , _ iwernga _ ap o s t l e- ngun il ghiit _ liite aqe asi _ esghapag luki _ temngingu ta i _ . _ taawa _ liite asi _ iqlengiqe ste u ut _ .
meghnugh igate usi _ ikfiqe llegh gpesineng _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ iilqayugigate usi llu _ .
iwernga _ piyuke nghite sigh ka _ elpesi nun _ un ang u uq _ , _ pin iq nan ii m aagh pesi nga _ , _ ugpeq aal gu te si llu _ sivugh nghaani _ piniqe llegh gpesistun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ puygu gpenaan _ piniqe ghllag yaqefsinga _ , _ ugpeq aal gu te si llu _ . _ P in iq nan igh agh pesi nga _ pi aqe llegh gpesistun _ . _ enkaam _ avuteghqe tek _ . _ piniqe nqigte kut _ pin iq s ug wh aa llegh pesi s tun _ . _ avuteghqe nghite kufsi _ , _ taku lusi _ iqite lleqe aqa _ kenegh lghutagh gpesi _ tunemagh a _ ne aneng _ .
iwernga _ una _ pinitun _ pil qagh si _ : _ ugumi ke asi _ pi aqe kangit _ N i c o l a us -em _ malig s aagh teng it a _ , _ katam _ whanga _ ugumi ke lleg mtun _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ ! _ tamaakut _ kayaalqe i i lghiit _ kayaalqe i i llegh meng _ negh sqe lleqe anka _ piite stekagh aneng _ uqfig an _ unguvallegh m _ , _ taw an l e nguq _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesighaghvig ani _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ S m y r n a- m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ whanga mneng _ pi u uq _ : _ sivulii unga llu _ kinguligh u unga llu _ , _ tuqu lunga _ unguvagh kau unga _ .
liisimake anka _ seghleliigh lleg si _ , _ akluma u usi llu _ iwernga _ aklungite usi _ ! _ liisimake aqa _ seghlegh t _ akuzite t _ ila ita _ yug t _ pi aqe kangit _ elpesi nun _ . _ J e w s - ngun ii qu t _ , _ J e w s - e pig un ghi tegh ng aagh meng _ . _ yugu ut _ qerngughte te kayug t _ tughneghagh m _ s y nag o gu e- ng ani _ .
alike gpenaki _ tamaakut _ ikfiqe te kete naqe kesi _ . _ nagate tek _ ! _ tughneghagh m _ ila si _ anusimingllagh ste naqe ai _ nanghiiqu na lusi _ . _ enkaam _ ikfiqe lleqe usi _ qula _ aghnegh nun _ . _ iwernga _ ataasiighmete tek _ , _ qaywa _ tuqu yaghq aagh ng aagh p esi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ , _ ak il egh tuus al ill eq am si _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ ! _ tamaakut _ kayaalqe i i lghiit _ kayaalqe i i llegh meng _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh n _ tuqu llegh m _ aqnighte naanghite ai _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ P er g am um -em _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ savigpag leg meng _ pi u uq _ inglugtun _ gginagh leg _ ipegsaghkagh meng _ .
liisimake amsi _ n aan tu t si _ , _ taw an tu si _ tughneghagh m _ umiileg u te i vig an _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ whanga mnun _ ataasiighmete usi _ , _ ugpeq nan ill ghi tagh pesi ng allu _ . _ tawatete kau usi _ talwa _ A n t ip a s _ , _ ataa s iigh m el nguq _ ungipaghteke _ , _ kiyagh teng ngu luku _ . _ tawani _ tughneghagh m _ kiyaghfig ani _ tuqute kaqe aat _ .
iwernga _ piyuke nghite sigh nka _ elpesi nun _ u ku nguut _ : _ taawa _ elpesi nite ut _ ila i _ qaatke te lghiit _ B al aam -em _ apeghtuusagh anun _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe a _ Balak _ naten _ seghlegh q es tes qell uki _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ . _ enkaam _ B al ak -em _ apeghtugh kaqe ai _ negh yagh ghngaita _ pi s qell uki _ neqe t _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe ai llu _ itagnagh ni luku _ alngunak _ s e x - kun _ seghleghqe lleghqagh _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ ila si _ qaatke te ut _ N i c o l a us -em _ apeghtuusagh anun _ .
A v utegh qell usi _ seghlegh q en nan igh tek _ ! _ pi nghite kufsi _ qantaghaqun _ taku lleqe amsi _ . _ taagken _ pi ll u w agh lleq an ka _ tamaakut _ yug t _ savigpag meng _ q an em n il ngugh meng _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ni _ ! _ manna- meng _ iigh nga lghii meng _ , _ m an n a- l ill eq aqa _ taana _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ ellnga nun llu _ tuune lleqe aqa _ qategh lghii _ uyghag _ , _ at egh r agh agh meng _ igaqe vikekagh _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nallukekagh a _ ategh _ iwerngaqun _ all g egh t ik aghh iin aam _ uyghag meng _ liisimake a _ .
" _ lata gu _ yaquleg _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ T h y at i r a- m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi u uq _ . _ iye kek _ kumaghugh u uk _ ken gh es tun _ , _ itegagh i _ qelmeghtutka ut _ siilu m _ q el megh s al gh a tun _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ . _ liisimake aqa _ piniqe llegh i _ , _ ugpeqe llegh i _ , _ qepghagh te i llegh i _ , _ n uq e tu t i llegh si llu _ . _ liisimake anka _ tamaakut _ wata _ pi aqe asi _ sivugh nghaani _ pi aqe llegh gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ u ku nguut _ teng v i mun _ ayuqekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ : _ Agh ul iigh n negh it agh si _ aghnagh _ Jezebel _ apeghtugh i lghii _ ipa u nghite ngugh neng _ . _ uuknaliqe ste u na iqe uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ iwernga _ apeghtugh i llegh mikun _ puughte aqe ai _ yug nka _ seghlegh q es qell uki _ s e x - kun _ , _ negh es qell uk illu _ neqe t _ aghqe tkekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ .
P i llegh q al it k aq sagh aqa _ avuteghqe sqellug qu _ , _ iwernga _ taaqe yu nghite uq _ allaniigh nghmeng _ .
ii-i _ ! _ miluute naqe aqa _ qavaghvig mun _ tawani _ ikfiqe sqellug qu _ . _ maligte te luki _ ellnga nun _ miluute lleqe anka _ tamaakut _ g el g aghn iil g ut angi _ enkaam _ ikfiqe ste ghllag lleqe anka _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe unga _ wetku qun _ av utegh k egk ata _ seghletun _ pi ll ghi t neng _ .
tuqu lleqe anka llu _ avaquti a _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ y ugh aghv ig n il nguut _ liite lleqe aatnga _ whanga u uq _ liisimake i lghii _ yug m _ tam agh aghh mi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itneng llu _ ilumike ke ii te neng llu _ . _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe amsi _ tam agh agh p esi _ seghlegh q e tu leg pesi s tun _ .
iwernga _ ila gpesi _ T h y at i r a- mi _ , _ maligte llghite asi _ J e z e b el -em _ seghlegh t _ apeghtugh i llegh i _ . _ liite llghite asi llu _ tughneghagh m _ aksaqumtaagh ghllag i _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qelegh aghagh naanghite amsi _ ,
iwerngaqun _ ugpeqe manginagh teggu _ apeghtugh lleg si _ kenlanga _ uteghnigh lleg mnun _ .
ellnga _ taana _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ kayaalqe i i llegh meng _ , _ atuqe i lghii llu _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mneng _ kenle mun _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el ill eq aqa _ iglegh u tes qell uki _ n at i o n - et _ .
igleghte te sqe luki _ i r o n - meng _ r o d - el igh luki _ enkaam _ k ag im n nak ang it _ qiku meng _ qulmesiite ngllaghkagh stun _ .
tuune lleqe anka llu _ un aa ngu m _ ighaleqetaagh aneng _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ S ar d is -em _ . _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh aneng _ pi leg _ m aagh r ag v in l ek lu _ ighaleqetaagh leg _ , _ pi uq _ , _ liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ . _ yug t _ pi aqe aisi _ unguva ni lusi _ iwernga _ tuqu nga usi _ .
taghtugh lusi _ , _ ik naq ugh sagh teg gu _ sa u a _ salin _ elpek si _ pi i _ tuqu naqe lghii _ . _ liite anka _ uk av an tut _ sa u aat _ pi aqe kesi _ kiyaghnegh ma _ pi sqe sug llegh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
neqamike luki _ apeghtugh tke aat _ elpesi nun _ , _ nagaqugh kasi llu _ . _ qaatke teki _ , _ avuteghqe tek llu _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ . _ iwernga _ taghtugh nghite kufsi _ , _ taku lleqe amsi _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ . _ N all uk ell eq agh si _ qakun _ tagi lleghqagh ka _ elpesi nun _ .
paninang _ q af si ng g aag ut _ yug t _ S ar d is - mi _ aatkagh teng _ nukeggnaghqe llghite kangit _ . _ igleghte lgusigh lleqe aatnga _ aate luteng _ qatelghii meng _ aatkagh meng _ qayughllak _ itagnagh lghii u ut _ .
kayaalqe i i lghii _ , _ ellngistun _ aate lleqe uq _ qatelghii meng _ aatkagh meng _ . _ ategh a llu _ gheve snaanghite aqa _ kenle ite ngugh m _ unguvallegh m _ igagh aneng _ . _ ata ma llu _ yaquleg an llu _ sivu itni _ whanga mnun _ pik n ill eq aqa _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ P h il a d el p h i a- m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ agleghnagh lghii meng _ , _ ipa pig meng _ pi u uq _ . _ ellnga nite uq _ D av i d -em _ key- nga _ . _ qelpeghtekunigu _ amigh k _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ umeg naanghite a _ . _ umeg kunigu llu _ amigh k _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ qelpeghte naanghite a _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ , _ liisimake amsi llu _ kayaate usi _ . _ naqamllu _ qaatke asi _ apeghtuusagh nka _ , _ mesighagh igate usi llu _ whanga mnun _ malig s aagh tek n il usi _ . _ ii-i _ , _ qelpegh te ma amsi _ amig meng _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ umeg yaghqaqe nghite ka aneng _ .
ii-i _ ! _ tamaakut _ qerngughte te lghiit _ tughneghagh m _ s y nag o gu e- ng ani _ , _ J e w s - ngun ii qu t _ . _ iwernga _ iqlengiqe ste u ut _ ; _ J e w s - ngun ghi tut _ . _ elpesi nun _ pi ste luki _ qungugh ste naqe anka _ sivu gpesigun _ . _ taagken _ liite lleqe aat _ piniqe kemsi _ .
qelqe aqe amsi _ n uq e tes qell usi _ . _ qaatke kaqe te gpesineng _ qelegh i llegh ka _ p aq n iigh sagh lleq am si _ seghleliigh llegh neng _ kaate naqe lghii neng _ nun at aghh anun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh t _ nanghiiqu lleqe ait _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna mi _ .
tagi yaghtugh unga _ . _ ayepsugite lusi _ ugpeqe manginagh tengnga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ w ay an ghi tes qell uki _ qaghpa si _ .
kayaalqe i i lghii _ aghveghaqetagh ughte ste lleqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh ma _ temple- nga ni _ , _ allameng llu _ aan aanghi tuq _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ igaqe lleqe aqa _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh ma _ , _ ategh a llu _ kiyaghnegh ma _ ne ghllag an _ , _ J er us al em - egh r agh aq _ , _ uki lghii _ qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh mneng _ . _ ellnga kun llu _ igaqe lleqe aqa _ ategh ragh aqa _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ nagate kek _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ taghneghagh k _ ugpeqagh nun _ !
" _ igaqe gu _ una _ ungipagh _ yaquleg mun _ igleghte te i lghii _ ugpeqagh neng _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ani _ L a o d i c e a- m _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ amen- meng _ pi u uq _ . _ A taa s iigh m el ngu ug uq _ , _ ip a pi gh q eng ng alghii ngu uq _ liisimake i sta _ . _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ .
liisimake amsi _ saul- qu tsi _ : _ isekinagh nghite usi _ , _ nalighmeng _ uguqnagh nghite usi _ . _ isekinagh lghiisi tuq _ nalighmeng _ uguqnagh lghiisi tuq _ !
enkaam _ m aq agh r aag g aa teg pesi neng _ , _ is ek in an ghi l ngu usi _ nalighmeng _ ug uq nan ghi l ngu usi _ , _ qesiite naqe amsi _ qanegh mneng _ !
pi aqe usi _ aklungite ni lusi _ , _ allgegh te ghllag aqe ni lusi _ , _ aklu igate ni lusi llu _ . _ iwernga _ nalluke usi _ seghlegh waagh u usi _ , _ nanglleg nagh usi _ , _ akluma usi _ , _ ayaa nga usi _ , _ amsikaghmete usi llu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ ak l ung i ghi s qell usi _ g o l d - teng yagh tugh tek _ whanga mnun _ qig egh teng ng w aaq ameng _ kenegh kun _ . _ tukfigh i tek llu _ whanga mneng _ qatelghii neng _ aatkagh neng _ s aap es qell uki _ kayngu nagh lghiit _ amsikaghmete lleg si _ . _ tukfigh i tek llu _ whanga mneng _ agha kaghqagh meng _ iye gpesinun _ esgh aa s ag u tes qell usi _ .
tamaakut _ piniqekagh nka _ nallghusagh aqe anka _ , _ aghyuugh aqe anka llu _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqnegh ughte tek _ , _ av utegh qell usi _ seghlegh q en nan igh tek _ .
ii-i _ ! _ nekeve lunga _ amig mi _ tenglugtugh unga _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nagaqugh kunigu _ me ka _ , _ amig meng _ qelpegh te ma kanganga _ itegh lleqe unga _ ellnga nun _ . _ enkaam _ neghe lgusigh lleqe aqa _ , _ ellnga n llu _ neghe lgusigh lleqe aanga _ .
kayaalqe i i lunga _ enkaam _ aqumga unga _ saaghw ani _ ata ma _ umiileg u sigh akun _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ aqume ste lleqe aqa _ saaghw mkun _ um iil gu si g ne kun _ aqumutagh mkun _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ , _ nagate kek _ taghneghagh k _ sa meng _ pi aqe te kek _ ugpeqagh nun _ ! _ "
taagken _ tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ taawa _ esghagh aqa _ qilag mi _ amigh k _ q el p al nguq _ ! _ me _ nagate kaqe a _ qalghightautetu te _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ mayugh a _ whavek _ . _ elpenun _ esghagh ste naqe anka _ sa u aat _ pi yaghqagh t _ . _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ taghneghagh gnite unga _ . _ taawa _ qilag mi _ es g agh ag ka _ umiileg u sigh k _ aqumutagh k _ , _ kina _ aqumga uq _ .
aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh gni _ esghaqaaluni _ iqeghta gketun _ j as p er -en kuk _ c ar n el i an -en kuk _ ayuqe uq _ . _ U v it ang ani _ umiileg u sigh m _ taawa _ aglu k _ iqeghta kek _ em er al d - e tun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
U v it ang ani _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ taawa _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ umiileg u sigh t _ aqumutagh lghute t _ . _ Taa ku t gun _ aqumga te nga ut _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ el d er - et _ qatelghii meng _ atkug yu aghte te luteng _ , _ g o l d - m eng llu _ qaghpa lug teng _ .
umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkeneng _ kallug m _ nighwaagpagtagh u i _ , _ leveklugti a _ , _ tengngaagti a llu _ pi ut _ . _ sivu gkeni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ taawa _ maaghraghvinleg _ t o r c h - et _ ku mang alghiit _ , _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ taghneghagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ sivu gkeni _ taawa _ kellaag igh te yu gnite ngughk _ qergese _ , _ megh r aa k egh t aq _ c r y s tal - es tun _ . _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ u v it ang ani _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ sani gkeni _ , _ taawa _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ iye ghllag u ut _ saye megteggun llu _ aq s ag em eg teg g un llu _ .
sivuligh _ unguva lghii _ l i o n - es ug n i te f tuq _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ unguva lghii _ o x - es ug n i te f tuq _ , _ pi nga yu aat _ sa u a _ unguva lghii _ gginagh lgu uq _ yug m _ gginagh aneng _ , _ enkaam _ estamat ii ta at _ unguva lghii _ tengaa kayug tun _ qawaagpag tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
enkaam _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ tamaghhagh meng _ aghvinleg neng _ yaquleg utu te ut _ , _ elngaatall _ yugusigh at _ iye ghllag u ut _ talwa _ qamavek _ yaq gh w it a _ asi itnun _ . _ aghneghtugh ma n _ unugtugh magh an _ taaqe igate ngugh t _ ilagagh nghmeng _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ , _ Atan gh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ , _ ellnga u uq _ maaten _ , _ ellnga u uq _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ ellnga u uq _ tagi yaghqagh _ ! _ "
taakut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ ilagagh ut _ ilagaate itneng _ usuqe i llegh m _ , _ qu ul v agh i llgh em _ , _ iyamsiqa yug llegh m _ aqumga lghii mun _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh ghllag gni _ , _ kiyaghte lghii mun _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ tawaten _ pi nghata
yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ el d er - et _ niinghute aqe ut _ sivungagh kun _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkenun _ , _ manigugh aqe aat _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ taakut _ el d er - et _ qaghpa teng _ mat- aghte luki _ lli aqe ait _ sivungagh kun _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag gkenka _ , _ enkaam _ ilagagh aqe ut _ ,
" _ whangkuta _ atanegh ut _ kiyaghnegh ut _ ! _ elpek _ tugu pestaagh yaghqaqe aten _ usuqe llegh ghllag t _ , _ qu ul v all egh llag et _ , _ iyamsiqa yug llegh ghllag t _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh pen un _ . _ ulima kaqe te gpeneng _ sa u a _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ , _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ enkaam _ allgegh u lleqe ut llu _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh anka _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ aghenqignegh an _ iiggagh nite luki _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ taakut _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ igagh vike kau ut _ inglugtun _ , _ umeg luteng _ maaghraghvinleg _ s e al -en eng _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ yaquleg _ . _ iglagtu luni _ aapte i lghii _ , _ " _ kina _ itagnagh yaghqau a _ ikugh yaghqaa luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ s e al - ell gh et _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ ? _ "
taawa _ avangite uq _ k itu meng _ alngunak _ qilag mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna m _ asi ani _ itagnagh lghii _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ , _ esghagh yaghqaa luki llu _ ilu it _ .
enkaam _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag unga _ qayughllak _ naalke nghite kangat _ kina _ alngunak _ itagnagh lghii _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ , _ esghagh yaghqaa luki llu _ ilu it _ .
taagken _ ataasigh m _ el d er -en eng _ pi unga _ , _ " _ qiya gpenang _ ! _ ii-i _ , _ l i o n - a _ . _ J u d a h - m _ ramke aneng _ pi u uq _ , _ D av i d - em llu _ kingunegh ke a _ . _ kayaalqe i i ste u uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ itagnagh uq _ ikugh yaghqaa luki _ maaghraghvinleg _ s e al - ell gh et _ qelpeghte yaghqaa luki _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ nekevgha lghii _ saaghw ani _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ . _ Q uk iit n i te f tuq _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ el d er - et lu _ . _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ esghaqaaluni _ nikimqun _ tuqu tke aq _ . _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sighunegh lgu uq _ , _ maaghraghvinleg neng llu _ iye lgu uq _ . _ taakut _ iye t _ maaghraghvinleg _ taghneghagh ke ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kayagtekagh i _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ nuna m _ .
P en n iigh agh aam _ taku luku _ umu i llgu sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ aqumga lghii _ , _ aghenqignegh an _ iiggagh neng _ tu w ii _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ .
tugu yaki _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ , _ taakut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ yuginagh llu _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ el d er - et _ sekete uute ut _ nuna mun _ sivungagh kun _ P en n iigh agh aam _ . _ Tam agh agh meng _ tugumiiqe luteng _ harp- meng _ , _ g o l d - m eng llu _ sagnegh ghhagh neng _ esleqnga lghiit _ in c en s e- meng _ . _ I n c en s e- et _ yughaghkagh it _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ .
ilagagh ut _ nutaghagh meng _ ilagaate meng _ whaten _ : _ " _ itagnagh uten _ tugu yaghqaa luki _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ , _ ikugh yaghqaa luki llu _ s e al - ng it _ . _ tuqute kau lghiiten _ , _ aa w pen eng llu _ tukfigh kaqe aten _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellngit _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ pi u ut _ ramke neng _ , _ ulu neng _ , _ yug neng _ , _ nunatagh aneng llu _ .
enkaam _ Atan egh pag u llgh an i tes t aten _ , _ priest- ngughte ta ten llu _ kiyaghnegh mnnun _ , _ umiileg stun llu _ igleghte te i lleqe ut _ nuna mi _ . _ "
esghapag ma lunga _ nagaqugh anka _ me it _ yaquleg lghute ghllag t _ . _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ k es te pag n ing il nguut _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ u v it ang ani _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ , _ el d er - et lu _ .
iglagtu luteng _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ tuqu tke aq _ , _ itagnagh uq _ allgeghsaghqagh u luku _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll eq _ , _ aklungi _ , _ peghqinellegh _ , _ iknaqe llegh _ , _ qu ul v all eq _ , _ n igh ugh qell eq _ , _ usuqe llegh llu _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ tamaghhagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ q ilag m el nguut _ , _ nun am el nguut _ , _ nuna m _ a si ng an il nguut _ , _ k ell iin il ngu ut lu _ . _ qamagte luteng _ pi lghiit _ aqumga lghii mun llu _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ , _ P en n iigh agh agh m un llu _ , _ " _ usuqe i lleg nge tek _ , _ qu ul v all eng i tek _ , _ n igh ugh qell eng i tek _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el gu tek lu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ pi ut _ , _ " _ amen _ , _ " _ el d er - et lu _ sekete uute luteng _ nuna mnun _ , _ manigugh agket _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ , _ P en n iigh agh aan kuk _ .
taagken _ esghapag aqa _ P en n iigh agh aam _ qelpeghtekanga _ sivuligh _ s e al - ell eq _ taa ku neng _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ s e al - ell egh neng _ . _ Taw an te f tut _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ ataasigh _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ me a _ kallug stun _ teng ng aal ghii _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ qategh lghii _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ ughluvegh lgu uq _ , _ qaghpa lightu aat llu _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kayaalqe i ikagh _ anguyag mineng _ , _ enkaam _ aane uq _ kayaalqe i i manginagh na luni _ .
P en n iigh agh aam _ q el pegh saq min igu _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ s e al - ell ghem _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ unguva lghii _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ "
ila a _ kuuni m _ aane uq _ , _ kavilngugh u uq _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ pi lleghqagh lightu aat _ yug t _ n ek eg g m e tun nan ii tes qell uki _ tuqu qu u tes qell uki _ . _ tuunekagh at llu _ savigpag ghrugllag meng _ .
taagken _ P en n iigh agh aam _ q el pegh saq min igu _ pi nga yiite anga _ s e al - ell ghem _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ pingayut ii ta at _ unguva lghii _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ esghagh aqa _ tagnegh lghii _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste nga _ apegh kau sigh lgu uq _ iigge mini _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ me stun _ ayuq es ug n il nguq _ akule itni _ estamat _ unguva lghiit _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Q u ar t -em _ imagh a _ wh e at - a _ akike a _ ataasigh m _ d en ar i us -em _ . _ pi nga yu t _ qu ar t -em _ imigh a _ b ar l e y - t _ akike ai _ ataasigh m _ d en ar i us -em _ . _ iwernga _ naafqe gpenakek _ o l iv e -em _ mesiigh a _ , _ wine- a llu _ . _ "
taagken _ P en n iigh agh aam _ q el pegh saq min igu _ estamat ii ta a _ s e al - ell ghem _ , _ nagaqugh aqa _ estamat ii ta at _ unguva lghiit _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ "
esghagh aqa _ agh s aa ll aa k _ kuug ni _ . _ igleghte te i ste yan _ ategh ke a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ H a d es -em _ maligte a _ . _ P i llegh q al it kaa f tu k _ tuqu q ii s qell uki _ es tam agh qell gh an _ nuna m _ yug i _ savigpag kun _ , _ p an egh aa te llegh qun _ , _ aqnighnegh kun _ , _ ug w igh s alghii t g un llu _ teghig ke sagh itgun _ nuna m _ .
taagken _ P en n iigh agh aam _ q el pegh saq min igu _ tallimat ii ta a _ s e al - ell ghem _ , _ esghagh anka _ asi anite luki _ aghqefig m _ unguva sagh it _ tuqu quqagh t _ . _ tuqute kaqe kangit _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kaqe kangit _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ ungipagh qu ma inagh ke ait llu _ .
akilghuu ghllag ut _ , _ " _ kaay _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ atanegh _ , _ agleghnagh uten llu _ , _ ipa pigu uten llu _ ! _ tamaakut _ nuna m _ yug i _ tuqu quqagh t _ whang kun neng _ , _ naten _ tag kaa n _ utaqa i uute naqe ziki _ nanqigte yaghqaa luki llu _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki llu _ ? _ "
taagken _ ataa si k agh t ii ta _ unguva sagh it _ tuqu tke aat _ qatelghii meng _ at ku y aal it k iit _ , _ meghnaali aghte sqekagh it llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ ila i _ ugpeq aal g ut ng it _ , _ Christ- am llu _ qep ghagh teng i _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ ellngit a _ tuqu te ll ghi s tun _ . _ enkaam _ meghnaali naqe ut _ kenlanga _ ug lagh tal ng it _ naamigtekata _ tamaakut _ tuqute yaghqagh t _ .
esghapag aqa _ P en n iigh agh aam _ q el pegh saq min igu _ aghvinleg ii ta a _ s e al - ell ghem _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ . _ siqinegh _ tagnegh a _ suvinagh lghii tun _ qiipaghagh tun _ ulimakagh tun _ g o at -em _ m el q w aneng _ . _ T an q iq llu _ esleqnga lghii _ aaw stun _ lliigh uq _ .
ighaleqetaagh t _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh qu uute ut _ nuna mun _ katam _ tawaten _ qig um ang il nguut _ f ig s - et _ ifkagh qu uute lghiit _ uqfig meng _ anuqe ghllag m _ ufsug te llegh atun _ .
qilag a _ aviighute uq _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ im ell ghi s tun _ , _ qamagte luteng _ naayghagh t llu _ qiighqagh t llu _ nuugh qugh te ut _ ne meggneng _ .
taagken _ nuna m _ umiileg i _ , _ iglegh ut is teng i _ , _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg it _ , _ ak l ung il nguut _ , _ qiilngumighte i kayug t _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ qep ghagh te l aagh et _ , _ qep ghagh te l aagh un ghi l ngu ut lu _ iigh uute ut _ qaye ni _ , _ akule itni llu _ uyghag t _ naayghagh ni _ .
naayghagh nun llu _ uyghag nun llu _ akilghuu ut _ , _ " _ ullegh vike kut _ iigh es qell uta _ gginagh aneng _ aqumga lghii m _ aqumutagh gkeni _ umiileg u sigh m _ , _ sakraa llegh ghllag aneng llu _ P en n iigh agh aam _ !
kaa tuq _ aghneq _ aghyuugh i lleghqagh ghllag ak _ whang kun nun _ enkaam _ kitum ngam _ anag lleqe agu _ ! _ "
tamaakut _ kingu itneng _ esghagh anka _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ nekevgha te lghiit _ estamat ni _ kangighagh itni _ nuna m _ . _ yaquleg t _ n uq neq ef t iit _ estamat _ anuqe t _ anuqligh nghite sqellug qu _ nuna mi _ nalighmeng _ kellii ni _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uqfig ni _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ mayugh lghii _ a siv agh meng _ tugumiigh leg _ nalluniigh ta aneng _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ yaquleg m _ ak il gh u ug ii _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh meng _ naafqe sqellug qu _ nuna _ , _ kellaag igh a llu _ .
yaquleg m _ pi a _ , _ " _ naafqe gpenaan _ nuna _ nalighmeng _ kellaag igh a _ nalighmeng _ uqfig t _ ! _ utaqa itek _ kenlanga _ s e al - ell em n nun _ qagugh itgun _ qep ghagh teng i _ kiyaghnegh mta _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ qafsig nge ta i _ yug t _ s e al - el agh tuq iit _ qagugh itgun _ . _ yug t _ uglaghtala it _ 1 4 4 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ ramke aneng _ I s r a el -em _ .
J u d a h - m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ , _ R e u b en -em _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ , _ G a d -em _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ ,
A s h er -em _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ , _ N ap h tal i - m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ , _ M an as s e h - m _ ramke aneng _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ ,
S im e o n -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ , _ L ev i -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ , _ I s s a c h ar -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ ,
Z e b ul un -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ , _ J o s ep h -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ , _ B en j am in -em _ ramke aneng _ , _ 1 2 , 0 0 0 - ngu f tut _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ esghagh anka _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag t _ yug lghute ghllag t _ kitum _ alngunak _ k es te pag n ing il k angi _ ! _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ pi u ut _ nunatagh aneng _ , _ ramke neng _ , _ yug neng _ , _ ulu neng llu _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ P en n iigh agh aam llu _ sivu gkenkun _ . _ qiipaghagh u uute luteng _ qatelghii neng _ , _ tugumiigh iigh luteng llu _ p al m -em _ uqfig an _ avayagh itneng _ .
akilghuu te ghllag ut _ , _ " _ yuguligh llegh _ kiyaghnegh mta _ pi ke aa _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ aqumga lghii _ , _ P en n iigh agh aam llu _ ! _ "
qamagte luteng _ yaquleg t _ nekeve uute ut _ u v it ang it ni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ el d er - et lu _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ . _ taagken _ sekete uute ut _ nuna mun _ sivungagh kun _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
pi ut _ , _ " _ amen _ ! _ kiyaghnegh ut _ tamaghhagh mi _ usuqe ligu _ , _ n igh ugh qell igu _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike ligu _ , _ qu ul v agh l igu _ qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ peghqinellegh leg _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el ek _ , _ iknaqe lleg leg llu _ . _ ellnga _ tawatete uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ ! _ "
taagken _ ataasigh m _ el d er -en eng _ aapte aanga _ , _ " _ kinkungaawa t _ qatelghii meng _ q ii p agh agh ng alghiit _ , _ naken llu _ pi u aat _ ? _ "
kiimsigh aqa _ , _ " _ yugu ni uq _ , _ elpek _ liisima katen _ . _ " _ El d er -em _ pi unga _ , _ " _ Taa ku nguut _ suflughte tke aat _ segh l el iigh r u ku t aagh llag meng _ . _ P en n iigh agh aam _ aaw akun _ aghvig luki _ qiipaghagh teng _ , _ qategh stekaqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivu gkeni _ kiyaghnegh m _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ manigugh aqe aat _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ temple- nga ni _ . _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ azigutigh lleqe ai _ nayute te nga llegh mineng _ .
iyatagh iqe nanigh lleqe ut _ , _ nalighmeng _ meqsug yug nanigh lleqe ut _ . _ S iq in ghem _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uguqnagh ghllag lghii m _ ugute naanghite ai _ .
pennagh ii aghagh aq _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ saaghw anite ngughk _ pennagh igh nigh ughtekete lleqe aat _ . _ maghyaghqugh lleqe ai _ sengngugh lghii nun _ megh nun _ unguv all el it ik ayug nun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ quni ightugh lleqe ai _ . _ "
P en n iigh agh aam _ qelpeghte aqe yamigu _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta a _ s e al - ell ghem _ , _ qilag mi _ q all eg nan igh waagh u tut _ entaqun _ aflu m _ aveg llegh atun _ tag kaa n _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ nekevgha lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh kun _ . _ tamaghhagh meng _ qalghightaute ngugh u te ut _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ , _ tugumiigh leg _ g o l d - meng _ sagnegh meng _ , _ tagi luni _ nekeve uq _ aghqefig gni _ . _ tuunekagh at _ in c en s e- el gh ut meng _ il a tes qell uki _ qamagte luki _ yughagh u i te nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ . _ yaquleg m _ lli a _ g o l d - eg nun _ aghqefig gnun _ siv ung an il ngu uk _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ .
I n c en s e -em _ agepsugh a _ mayugh uq _ maligte te luni _ yughagh llegh itgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ . _ mayugh ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ sagnegh meng _ yaquleg m _ tugumiigh aneng _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ , _ tugu luku _ sagnegh _ , _ imigh aa _ ken gh aneng _ aghqefig m _ . _ sagnegh m _ imigh a _ miluute ai _ nuna mun _ . _ enkaam _ kallugughte ghllag uq _ , _ kavlegtagh ghllag uq _ , _ n igh waagh pag tagh llag tuq _ , _ nuna llu _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ qalghightate te leg t _ yataaghqe ut _ q al ghi gh t in al uteng _ .
sivuligh m _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ kaftekrag nkuk _ , _ ken gh en kuk _ akume lutek _ aaw meng _ nuna mun _ miluute agket _ . _ enkaam _ pi ng ay ugh qell gha _ nuna m _ panegh uq _ , _ pi ng ay ugh qell ghi t lu _ uqfig t _ panegh ut _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ sungaghyug lghiit _ vegaagh t _ panegh ut _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ sa u a _ naayghagh ghllagte yu gnite ngughk _ kum agh ug ng alghii _ , _ miluute aat _ kellii nun _ . _ enkaam _ pi ng ay ugh qell gha _ kellii m _ aa w g ugh tuq _ .
P ing ay ugh qell ghi t _ k ell iin il nguut _ unguva lghiit _ tuqu ut _ , _ pi ng ay ugh qell ghi t lu _ angyaghpag t _ naa f q eng ng w aa ghii _ .
pingayut ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii _ t o r c h - e tun _ , _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh uq _ pi ng ay ugh qell ghi t gun _ kiiw t llu _ sengngugh lghiit llu _ megh t _ .
ategh a _ ighaleqetaagh m _ " _ sungagh ni _ " _ . _ P ing ay ugh qell gha _ megh m _ s ung aghn igh tek aq _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ megh luteng _ tuqukagh t _ qayughllak _ megh _ s ung aghn igh te kaa l ghii _ .
estamat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ s aam _ tenpe ai _ siqinegh _ , _ tanqigh _ , _ igh al eq at aagh et lu _ , _ enkaam _ pi ng ay ugh qell gh i _ mamlegte ai _ . _ P ing ay ugh qell gha _ aghnegh m _ mamleg a _ , _ pi ng ay ugh qell gh allu _ un ug em _ .
esghagh aqa llu _ nagaqugh aqa llu _ qawaagpag _ tengaa lghii _ quulvani _ , _ iglagtu luni _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu uq _ ! _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu uq _ ! _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu uq _ ! _ kinguligh t _ pi nga yu t _ yaquleg t _ q al ghi gh h naq eg ku meg tek i _ qalghightate te teng _ , _ taagken _ elngaatall _ seghlegh pestaagh u naqngu uq _ yug nun _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ tamaani _ pi llegh ni _ ! _ "
taagken _ tallimat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ esghagh aqa _ ighaleqetaagh _ ifkaghkagh _ qilaga meng _ nuna mun _ , _ ke y - l it kaa f tuq lu _ qelpeghte sqellug qu _ a si l igh negh il nguq _ laag u aq _ .
ighaleqetaagh m _ qelpegh a _ a si l igh negh il nguq _ laag u aq _ . _ T es am ak en _ agepsugh _ aane uq _ katam _ agepsugh atun _ egllu ghllag m _ repall _ siqinegh llu _ qilag a llu _ mamleg a _ agepsugh m _ .
taagken _ agepsugh meng _ aanleghaate ut _ l o c us t- el gh u tet _ , _ nuna mun llu _ ukig uute ut _ . _ K aa pig aq legh u tek at _ yug neng _ , _ katam _ s c o r pi o n - et _ kaa pii qell ghi s tun _ .
ungipaate kau lghiit _ l o c us t- et _ naafqe fqiita _ vegaagh t _ pi s qell uki _ nalighmeng _ sungaghyug t _ nunivagseghagh t _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uqfig t _ . _ aqnighte sqekagh i llu _ tam aa ku ng in aat _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nalluniigh llghite kangi _ qagugh itgun _ .
L o c us t- en un _ tuqu qugh ste na nigh ke ai _ tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ taawanginaq _ ik f iq es tegh llag es tes q egk ii _ t all im anun _ tanqigh nun _ . _ S c o r pi o n - et _ kaa p ell ghi s tun _ yug t _ ikfiqe ghllagkagh t _ .
Taa ku ni _ tallimat ni _ tanqigh ni _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tuquyug pigte lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqupagningite lleqe ut _ . _ yug t _ tuqu naqe ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu naanghite ut _ .
L o c us t- et _ esghaqagh u luteng _ kuuni stun _ ayuqe ut _ pi ll u w amun _ yataaghqekagh t _ . _ N aa s q w it n i te f tut _ llangaqa _ g o l d - et _ qaghpa t _ , _ gginagh it llu _ yug t _ g g in ii s tun _ ayuqe luteng _ .
nuyagh it _ aghnagh t _ n uy ii s tun _ ayuqe luteng _ , _ ggute it llu _ l i o n - et _ g gu ut ng is tun _ ayuqe luteng _ .
yugusigh megteggun _ q al te l gu f tut _ esghaqagh u luteng _ savikenghaagh t _ sakimag iitagh t _ . _ Y aq w ghi t allu _ sulugtagh llegh it _ llangaqa _ c h ar i o t- et _ kuunituqagh t _ sukera lghiit _ pi ll u w amun _ .
papeg lgu ut _ s c o r pi o n - es tun _ kaape i kayug meng _ . _ enkaam _ t all im anun _ tanqigh nun _ yug t _ ikfiqe ste ghllag ait _ papeg meggneng _ kapugh luki _ .
umiileg lgu ut _ igleghte te i lghii _ ellngit neng _ , _ yaquleg u uq _ esghagh ma ke i ste nga _ a si l igh negh il ngu u m _ laawaagh m _ . _ H e b r e w - s tun _ ategh a _ A b a d d o n _ , _ G r e ek - es tun _ A p o ll y o n _ , _ ( _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ naafqii sta _ " _ ) _ .
sivuligh _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag _ alpag uq _ , _ taa m _ kingu aneng _ paninang _ maalghug _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag k _ pi yaghqaa uk _ .
taagken _ aghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ g o l d - eg neng _ aghqefig gneng _ es tam aneng _ sighunegh leg gneng _ te ke r qam eg ne kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ siv ung an il ngu uk _ .
Taa m _ me m _ aleghqugh aa _ aghvinleg ii ta at _ yaquleg t _ qalghightate te leg _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iteme te ki _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ a sigh q eng ng alghiit _ k iig w llag eg ni _ E u p h r a tes - eg ni _ ! _ "
enkaam _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ iteme tke ai _ . _ yataaghqe kau ut _ tea- mete te _ aflu mun _ , _ aghnegh mun _ , _ tanqigh mun _ , _ ayumiqullegh mun llu _ tuqu q ii s qell uki _ pi ng ay ugh qell gh i _ yug t _ .
ungipaate aanga _ uglaghtala itneng _ kuuni tgun _ igleghte lghiit _ pi ll u w agh tet _ , _ 2 0 0 _ m ill i o n - ngu f tut _ .
esghaghwaagh lleg mkun _ esghagh anka _ kuuni t _ , _ iglegh ut is teng it lu _ . _ sakimag iitagh it _ ken gh es tun _ kavite ut _ , _ s ap p h i r e- es tun _ sungaghyukegte ut _ , _ s ul p h u r - es tun _ , _ y ell o w - ngu f tut _ . _ kuuni t _ naa s q w it _ l i o n - et _ naa s q w is tun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ q aanghi t neng _ aane ut _ kenegh _ , _ agepsugh _ , _ sulphur- a _ .
Taa ku t gun _ pi nga yu tgun _ naafqii llegh ghllag tgun _ tuqu qugh ait _ pi ng ay ugh qell gh i _ yug t _ . _ kuuni t _ q aanghi t neng _ aanleghaate ut _ kenegh _ , _ ag ep es uq _ , _ sulphur- a _ .
kuuni t _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el gu ut _ q aanghi t n illu _ papeg itni llu _ . _ papeg it _ nemeghyagh stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ naasqugh leg t _ kiitigh qu sagh it _ yug nun _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tuqute llghite kangit _ tamaakut _ naafqii llegh ghllag t _ , _ avuteghqe ma ite ngugh t _ pegte yug ma ite kangit _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh teng _ . _ manigugh nanigh mangite ait _ tughneghagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t llu _ ulimaagh t _ g o l d - meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ siilu meng _ , _ uyghag meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng llu _ . _ tamaakut _ esghaate yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ , _ nagaqugh te yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ piyug yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ .
talwa _ avuteghqe tke ma ite kangit _ yugtagh lleg teng _ , _ alignaghtaagh lleg teng _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe te llegh eng _ , _ nalighmeng _ tegleg niigh lleg teng _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ aghtugh igate ghllag _ yaquleg _ uki lghii _ qilag meng _ . _ pilugug nga uq _ q ilag waagh meng _ , _ naa s q w an _ qula ani _ aglu k _ , _ gginagh a _ siqinegh tun _ kuukgute luni _ , _ ighu kek llu _ kumaghugh lghii stun _ pi ll ar - es tun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
tugumiiqe ai _ ii m g at _ igagh ghhaat _ q el p al nguut _ . _ aghenqignegh t _ itegagh ni _ tuute ste ai _ kellii m _ megh an _ qaye akun _ , _ saghumignegh t llu _ itegagh ni _ tuute ste ai _ qute kun _ .
iglagtu pigte luni _ akilghuu uq _ l i o n -em _ u w igh h n ii llgh a tun _ . _ akilghuu ghllag yan _ m aa r aghv in leg y ag et _ kallug t _ tengngaagtagh ut _ .
maaghraghvinlegyage t _ kallug t _ tengngaagtagh yata _ igaqe naqe yagh anka _ sa meng _ pi ll ghi t _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ aksaqe ki _ maaghraghvinlegyage t _ kallug t _ sa meng _ pi ll ghi t _ , _ igaqe gpenaki _ ! _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ nekevgha lghii _ kellii kun llu _ qute kun llu _ . _ qilag mun _ nengug te ai _ aghenqignegh t _ iigge ni _ ,
akeqe i uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh akun _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ ellnga u lghii _ ul im agh ik aq _ qilaga meng _ , _ nuna meng _ , _ kellii neng _ , _ sa meng llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ taa kun il ngugh neng _ . _ yaquleg _ pi uq _ , _ " _ pi lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ .
iwernga _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ q al ghi gh h naq eg kum igu _ qalghightate te ni _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ uspeqe i lleg ni _ qayvighte ma ite kete ni _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ uspeqe i llegh a _ ataasigh u uq _ aapte qugh a _ qep ghagh te min un _ u uk nal iq is t en un _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqughkagh ma _ me m _ qilag meng _ aleghqugh laatagh aanga _ , _ " _ aglagh luten _ tugu ki _ q el p al nguut _ ii m g at _ igagh t _ iig g an il nguut _ yaquleg m _ nekevgha lghii m _ kellii kun llu _ qute kun llu _ . _ "
yaquleg mun _ aglagh lunga _ tungsigh anka _ imeg nga lghiit _ igagh ghhaat _ . _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tugu luki _ neghe ki _ ; _ aqsaqugh gpeni _ qugaagte lleqe ut _ iwernga _ qanegh gpeni _ muugate lleqe ut _ h o ne y - s tun _ . _ "
yaquleg m _ iiggagh neng _ tugu luki _ ii m g at _ igagh ghhaat _ negh anka _ , _ imani _ qanegh mni _ muugate ut _ h o ne y - s tun _ . _ iwernga _ tuufte yaqenka _ aqsaqugh ka _ qu w aag t aa _ .
taagken _ pi atnga _ , _ " _ allameng _ uuknaliqe tke pestaagh yaghqaqe aten _ yug lghute t _ , _ nunatagh lghute t _ , _ al aagh h iin aat _ ulu lghute t _ , _ umiileg lghute t llu _ . _ "
taagken _ kitum _ ayaviigh lightu aanga _ usputagh sigh ke sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ kayagte aanga _ , _ " _ usputagh yaghtugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ , _ aghqefig k llu _ , _ keste naketen llu _ yug t _ maniguute lghiit _ tawani _ .
iwernga _ usputagh gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nge an _ court-nga _ eslatagh anite ngughk _ , _ qayughllak _ tuune kau uq _ G en t il e- en un _ . _ T ut m aa s gh aq naq ng w aat _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ f o r t y _ t w o - gh y ag ni _ tanqigh ni _ .
ungipaghteke _ pilugug nga lghiik _ s a c k c l o t h - meng _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el ell eq ag ka _ uuknaliqe sqellug kek _ 1 , 2 6 0 _ aghnegh nun _ . _ "
maalghug _ ungipagh tek _ maalghug u uk _ o l iv e -em _ uqfig k _ , _ maalghug u uk llu _ kenegh lghutagh m _ tunemagh kek _ nekevgha lghiik _ sivungagh ni _ Atan gh an _ nuna m _ .
